projects.name: Snake AI
projects.description: A machine learning AI that uses Deep Q-learning to play the game snake. Developed from scratch using pure C++ and C++ standard libraries.

projects.name: Number Classifier
projects.description: A simple feed-forward neural network that was trained on the MNIST handwritting numbers dataset to identify numbers. Developed from scratching using only C++ and C++ standard libraries.

projects.name: SnekOS
projects.description: A simple 64bit operating system that runs snake and executes user commands.

projects.name: Wonton Engine
projects.description: A custom game engine built using the OpenGL API and C++. Currently in progress.

projects.name: Cube Shooter
projects.description: Created as a use-case for my custom dungeon generator. The game consists of shooting down all enemies in a dungeon to win.

projects.name: Lights Out
projects.description: Made for a school game development competition with the theme "Lights Out". This game came first place.
